languages.text: "Да... похожа на нашу, такой все отряды пользуются... Так это что выходит, эти гады нас все это время подслушивать могли? Вот как мой отряд в засаду попал!"
"Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"
languages.original_text: "Да... похожа на нашу, такой все отряды пользуются... Так это что выходит, эти гады нас все это время подслушивать могли? Вот как мой отряд в засаду попал!"

traits.locale_text: "Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So does this mean those bastards could listen in on us all this time? That was how my squad got ambushed!"
"Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So does this mean those bastards could listen in on us all this time? That was how my squad got ambushed!"
"Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"

"Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"

languages.text: "Ja ... sieht aus wie einer von unseren. Alle unsere Trupps verwenden dieses Modell ... Heißt das etwa, dass diese Arschlöcher uns die ganze Zeit über belauscht haben? Deswegen ist mein Trupp in einen Hinterhalt geraten!"
languages.original_text: "Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja ... sieht aus wie einer von unseren. Alle unsere Trupps verwenden dieses Modell ... Heißt das etwa, dass diese Arschlöcher uns die ganze Zeit über belauscht haben? Deswegen ist mein Trupp in einen Hinterhalt geraten!"

languages.text: « Oui, on dirait l'un des nôtres. Toutes nos escouades s'en servent... Ça veut dire que ces ordures nous espionnaient depuis tout ce temps ? C'est pour ça que mon escouade est tombée dans une embuscade ! »
languages.original_text: "Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"

traits.locale_text: « Oui, on dirait l'un des nôtres. Toutes nos escouades s'en servent... Ça veut dire que ces ordures nous espionnaient depuis tout ce temps ? C'est pour ça que mon escouade est tombée dans une embuscade ! »

languages.text: “我认得……这看起来像是我们用的通讯器……我们所有小队都会使用都会使用的款式……也就是说，那群王八蛋一直都在窃听我们的通话？我的小队之所以遭到伏击，原来这才是原因！”
languages.original_text: "Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"

traits.locale_text: “我认得……这看起来像是我们用的通讯器……我们所有小队都会使用都会使用的款式……也就是说，那群王八蛋一直都在窃听我们的通话？我的小队之所以遭到伏击，原来这才是原因！”

languages.text: 「ええ…我々の物のようです。我らの分隊は、みんな使っています。ということは、あの野郎どもは今までずっと私たちのことを盗聴していたってことか？だから私の分隊は待ち伏せされたんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"

traits.locale_text: 「ええ…我々の物のようです。我らの分隊は、みんな使っています。ということは、あの野郎どもは今までずっと私たちのことを盗聴していたってことか？だから私の分隊は待ち伏せされたんだ！」

languages.text: «Sí... parece de los nuestros, todos nuestros escuadrones los usan... ¿Significa que esos desgraciados podrían habernos estado espiando todo este tiempo? ¡Por eso emboscaron a mi pelotón!».
languages.original_text: "Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"

traits.locale_text: «Sí... parece de los nuestros, todos nuestros escuadrones los usan... ¿Significa que esos desgraciados podrían habernos estado espiando todo este tiempo? ¡Por eso emboscaron a mi pelotón!».

languages.text: "Evet... Bizimkilere benziyor. Bütün mangalar kullanır... Bu şerefsizler bunca zamandır bizi mi dinliyormuş? Mangamı öyle pusuya düşürdüler demek!"
languages.original_text: "Yes... looks like one of ours — all our squads use them... So, does this mean those bastards could have been eavesdropping on us all this time? That was why my squad got ambushed!"
